snippet: According to jail policy, Fabian Cruz, 35, should have been on round-the-clock observation, called for by a mental-health clinician 24 hours earlier.
abstract: Mentally ill inmate Fabian Cruz is found dead inside his cell in Rikers Island Prison with bedsheet wrapped around his neck; suicide highlights dysfunction that continues to pervade the jail even as New York City officials work to fix it; Justice Department has filed lawsuit against the city for widespread abuse and neglect of inmates.
lead_paragraph: According to jail policy, Fabian Cruz, 35, should have been on round-the-clock observation, called for by a mental-health clinician 24 hours earlier.

headline.main: Rikers Inmate Found Dead Despite Suicide-Watch Alert
headline.print_headline: Rikers Inmate Found Dead Despite Suicide-Watch Alert
